comments.comment:
ekak bel mahata atata oya dambaran pilima wahanse lebilath kitunu baktiyakuwe me pilima wahanse mila kla noheki metak klayak araksha kara tebime gaurawaya beltath belge chatintath palamuwa jatiyak wasayen api garu kala yutui 
deka oka horen ho kenek deela ho bel arangihin eka vikunan kewe nr unu kale ne enisa oka me wenakal lanawe oya pansalaka tibbanam me kautuka wastuwe aluth nomatha ape tirisanek oka unu kara ho horakam kara vikunanm kala awasan 
tuna oya budupilima wahanse maha anusas eti eastuwak nisa yali ape ratatama lebima asscharyamath deyaki
hatara metaram mila kala heki utum wastuwak e minissu apasu parittiga karaddi adugane uda rata netum bera turya wadana paturavmahath harasarin piligata yutuwa tibuna noweda?
eth nilaga deala bandarath danta datun wahansege awatewa karana gon sangayawahaselath kisima garu saruwak netuwa e utum pilima wahansewa ohe pettakin tebuwa dekka neda?
e belge munuburanta hitenna ethi eka dekkama apahu deeme modakam me wage gobbainta
hema magulatama wedak neti netum geyum wadana tiyena me gobba bas nayaka nilameyath gon sangayalath mun jivath wennema utum danta datuwa vikunam kala ehew eke me utuma prittigaya karapu ekatawath respect kale ne kalakanni man wagenam loweth apahu denne ne me wage kalakannin inna ratakata
‚Äúgaraocha niwathocha‚Äù
me utum budu wadanawath okun ta amataka unu mun maranin matu satara maha apayemai wetenne hetuwa budunge danta datuwa vikunankana mun utum budun wahanseta dakwana gaurwaya antima nicha nisa e papen okunta tanaturu walin mannen ilippunata budun wahanse anukampa nokarana nisaya
comments.author: Sarati Lanka
